data.text: @themusicalnerd2 Was he really that involved with Guardians? As far as I know he just did lines in a booth. Gunns brother was the one on set playing Rocket.
@CubeF1 My thinking is at least he’d stay true to James Gunn’s vision. I’m really not sure bringing other directors that were uninvolved would be a good idea.
@themusicalnerd2 He hasn't proved himself to have what it takes to take on such a big property. I wouldn't take the risk if I were disney. He has directed once

@themusicalnerd2 No. I’m looking forward to A Star Is Born sooooo much, but he would not be a good fit on Guardians. He barely spent time on set, he only comes in for lines. Gunn’s brother does the motion capture for rocket.
